rationale: Database Replay: Workload Replay requires a license for Oracle Real Application Testing to use.
recommended_action: Don't use RAT features or disable it in the Oracle binaries: https://docs.oracle.com/en/database/oracle/oracle-database/18/riwin/enabling-and-disabling-database-options-after-installation.html#GUID-C45D75FC-34B5-4C24-9DE8-1518044A3BB3
error_message: Database Replay: Workload Replay is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Real Application Testing
